column5: Louisiana screened-in front porch. Open floor plan great for cooking. 2800sq ft. wood floors, whole house all to yourself! 2 acre beautiful lot with privacy and 4 parking spots. Water softener and reverse osmosis filtration for drinking. DirecTV in theater/living room and master bedroom. 24 Check-In. Close to all the Baytown expansions at Exxon, Chevron, La Porte, Etc. 15 minutes from downtown Houston.
